name: Garnier
0:
”Alexa, Open Garnier”
”Alexa, Find my shade.”
”Alexa, ask Garnier what are some cute hairstyles?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: garnier
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Garnier is dedicated to giving you tips, tricks, and information on all things hair. Learn how to make fun hairstyles, apply hair color at home, and about key haircare ingredients that you need in your regimen. 
 
After the welcome message simply ask or tell Alexa what you want to learn about, for example: 
• I want to learn about cute hairstyles. 
• What is argan oil? 
• How do I wake up with better curls? 
• How often should I color my hair at home? 
• How do I apply Nutrisse? 
• How can I prevent frizzy hair? 
• What is a hair mask? 
 
Remember to check back regularly to get the latest on hair trends and new tips!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
